commit.message:
tree-ssa-pre.c (bitmap_set_and): Avoid bitmap copy.

2017-05-08  Richard Biener  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* tree-ssa-pre.c (bitmap_set_and): Avoid bitmap copy.
	(bitmap_set_subtract_values): Likewise.
